dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3572 IH: To revise the boundaries of certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in North Carolina.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. McIntyre introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To revise the boundaries of certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in North Carolina.

section.header: Replacement of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System maps

subsection.text: The maps subtitled Lea Island Complex L07; Wrightsville Beach Unit L08, Masonboro Island Unit L09; and Masonboro Island Unit L09, included in the set of maps entitled John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System referred to in section 4(a) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act ( 16 U.S.C. 3503(a) ) and relating to certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in North Carolina, are hereby replaced by other maps relating to the units entitled Lea Island Complex L07; Wrightsville Beach Unit L08, Masonboro Island Unit L09; and Masonboro Island Unit L09 and dated _____.

The Secretary of the Interior shall keep the replacement maps referred to in subsection (a) on file and available for inspection in accordance with section 4(b) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act ( 16 U.S.C. 3503(b) ).
